scripts.start:dev: npm run env:dev npm run startLocal
scripts.start:staging: npm run env:staging npm run startLocal
scripts.start:prod: npm run env:prod npm run startLocal
scripts.start_android:dev: npm run env:dev npm run startAndroid
scripts.start_android:staging: npm run env:staging npm run startAndroid
scripts.start_android:prod: npm run env:prod npm run startAndroid
scripts.start_ios:dev: npm run env:dev npm run startiOS
scripts.start_ios:staging: npm run env:staging npm run startiOS
scripts.start_ios:prod: npm run env:prod npm run startiOS
scripts.build_local:staging: npm run env:staging npm run buildLocal
scripts.build_local:prod: npm run env:prod npm run buildLocal
scripts.build_docker:staging: npm run env:staging npm run buildPushDocker
scripts.build_docker:prod: npm run env:prod npm run buildPushDocker
scripts.build_android:staging: npm run env:staging npm run buildAndroid
scripts.build_android:prod: npm run env:prod npm run buildAndroid
scripts.startAndroid: npm run buildLocal && npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew assembleDebug && gradlew installDebug && cd ..
scripts.startiOS: npm run buildLocal && npx cap sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.buildCI: npx browserslist@latest --update-db updates caniuse-lite && cross-env CI=false GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=true react-scripts --max_old_space_size=4096 build && npm run addPreloadLinks
scripts.buildLocal: npm run auditCI && npm run testCI && npm run buildCI
scripts.buildPushDocker: npm run buildLocal && cross-env-shell docker image build -t $DOCKER_IMAGE . -f Dockerfile.local && cross-env-shell docker push $DOCKER_IMAGE && cross-env-shell docker run caprover/cli-caprover:v2.1.1 caprover deploy --caproverUrl $CAPROVER_URL --caproverPassword $CAPROVER_PASSWORD --caproverApp $CAPROVER_APP --imageName $DOCKER_IMAGE && cross-env-shell docker image rm $DOCKER_IMAGE
scripts.buildAndroid: npm run buildLocal && npx cap sync && cd android && gradlew bundleRelease && cd .. && cross-env-shell jarsigner -keystore ./_env/flawk_android_keystore.env -storepass $ANDROID_KEYSTORE_PASS ./android/app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab $ANDROID_KEYSTORE_ALIAS
scripts.auditFix: npm audit --production fix && npm run auditCI
